title:
Twin-star hypothesis and cycle-free $d$-partitions of $K_{2d}$
  ]{Twin-star hypothesis and cycle-free $d$-partitions of $K_{2d}$
authors: Matthew J. Fyfe, Steven R. Lippold, Mihai D. Staic, Alin Stancu
abstract:
In this paper we study an equivalence relation defined on the set of
cycle-free $d$-partitions of the complete graph $K_{2d}$. We discuss a
conjecture which states that this equivalence relation has only one equivalence
class, and show that the conjecture is equivalent with the so called twin-star
hypothesis. We check the conjecture in the case $d=4$ and disuses how this
relates to the determinant-like map $det^{S^2}$.
